content.rendered: [vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1513589224331{margin-top: -20px !important;padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background-color: #e7e8e9 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Team” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:50|text_align:center|color:%23404244″ google_fonts=”font_family:Playfair%20Display%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1430621420612{margin-bottom: -23px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”65px”][vc_column_text]All of Ali Hassan & Associates attorneys are graduates of respected, accredited law schools, and are well trained and experienced in their areas of practice. The Firm’s Attorneys can draw upon over 200 years of collective legal experience in meeting the needs of the firm’s clients. The attorneys are aided in their efforts by highly skilled support staff. The team at Ali Hassan & Associates provide solutions with an unparalleled personal service to ensure your business and/or case is a success, from a legal perspective.[/vc_column_text][cms_carousel xsmall_items=”1″ small_items=”2″ medium_items=”2″ large_items=”3″ margin=”30″ nav=”false” dots=”false” source=”size:All|order_by:menu_order|order:ASC|post_type:team” left_arrow=”fa fa-arrow-left” right_arrow=”fa fa-arrow-right” cms_template=”cms_carousel–team.php”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
